conversations_v0.question: Clarify the contents of the displayed image with great detail.
conversations_v0.answer: The diagram shows a simple way to make an iron nail become electromagnet. A wire is run from the positive side of a battery then coil around the nail then to the negative side of the battery. As electric current flows through the wire, magnetic field is produced around the coil of wire with the electric current. The coil of wire with electric current flowing through it is called a solenoid. The more turns the coil has, the strong the electromagnetic field will be.

c. Motor
d. Solenoid

a. nothing
b. pins would fall back down
c. a fire would start
d. more pins would be picked up
conversations_v0.answer: b pins would fall back down
